about_the_game:
You know that guy who made music for a MULTIPLAYER game, with LYRICS? Yeah, sorry, he made this as well. At least the kazoo is gone


Immerse yourself in the quirky and playful world of Immerse yourself in the quirky and playful world of 'Who's Your Daddy' with its official soundtrack, composed by the talented Mathias Bjørnskov.

This massive collection features 83 tracks that perfectly capture the game's whimsical and chaotic essence. Dive into the sounds that make 'Who's Your Daddy?!' a truly unforgettable multiplayer parenting simulator.

Also, if you do not have interest in spending money to support a musician's livelihood, you can listen to the soundtrack for free on YouTube, but you won't get these high quality wav files.
